对抗长期新冠肺炎的大脑线索：研究查明神经炎症血管功能障碍的循环标志物与神经炎症之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Brain-clues-in-the-battle-against-long-COVID-study-pinpoints-neuroinflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Brain-clues-in-the-battle-against-long-COVID-study-pinpoints-neuroinflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3149ff5d-6193-4a20-83ba-e49414991670 Wed, 25 Oct 2023 06:13:00 -0400 Brain clues in the battle against long COVID: study pinpoints neuroinflammation
英国生物银行揭示：地中海饮食可能是对抗32种慢性病的关键！社区居住成年人健康饮食模式与 48 种慢性疾病之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/UK-Biobank-reveals-Mediterranean-diet-might-be-the-key-to-combating-32-chronic-diseases!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/UK-Biobank-reveals-Mediterranean-diet-might-be-the-key-to-combating-32-chronic-diseases!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=461c7846-4434-463b-b351-896cee2e1c1b Wed, 25 Oct 2023 05:45:00 -0400 UK Biobank reveals: Mediterranean diet might be the key to combating 32 chronic diseases!
痴呆症和胆固醇：调查激素替代疗法的联系和影响激素替代疗法（HRT）、血清胆固醇水平和痴呆症发病率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Dementia-and-cholesterol-investigating-links-and-impacts-of-hormone-replacement-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231025/Dementia-and-cholesterol-investigating-links-and-impacts-of-hormone-replacement-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36850655-af63-4f6d-8304-4ca3ee5d042d Wed, 25 Oct 2023 05:14:00 -0400 Dementia and cholesterol: investigating links and impacts of hormone replacement therapy

Study examines potential and challenges
新的生物材料可以改变人体组织在实验室中生长的方式悉尼新南威尔士大学的科学家们创造了一种新材料，可以改变人体组织在实验室中生长和在医疗程序中使用的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-biomaterial-could-change-the-way- human-tissue-can-be-grown-in-the-lab.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-biomaterial-could-change-the-way- human-tissue-can-be-grown-in-the-lab.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e6e5b87-6bea-4489-b92f-4d603a904cb7 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 23:28:54 -0400 New biomaterial could change the way human tissue can be grown in the lab
新的软件工具提供了一种更安全的基因组编辑设计方法一组研究人员开发了一种名为 DANGER（通过 RNA 测序评估的有害和可预期指南）分析的软件工具，该工具为所有具有转录组的生物体中更安全的基因组编辑设计提供了一种方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-software-tool-provides-a-way-for-safer-design-of-genome-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/New-software-tool-provides-a-way-for-safer-design-of-genome-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=848b1f50-69f8-418d-8261-15cec53a060e Tue, 24 Oct 2023 22:56:37 -0400 New software tool provides a way for safer design of genome editing
研究显示，四岁的孩子在无聊时会多吃 79% 的卡路里阿斯顿大学进行的一项新研究表明，四岁的孩子在无聊时比心情平和时多摄入 79% 的卡路里。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Children-as-young-as-four-years-old-eat-7925-more-calories-when-bored-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Children-as-young-as-four-years-old-eat-7925-more-calories-when-bored-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=341b6292-b87d-469e-9bcb-76e63d699c72 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 22:52:23 -0400 Children as young as four years old eat 79% more calories when bored, study shows
研究人员开发用于自动结直肠癌组织分析的人工智能工具于韦斯屈莱大学的研究人员与图尔库大学生物医学研究所和芬兰中部诺瓦大学合作开发了一种用于自动结直肠癌组织分析的人工智能工具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Researchers-develop-artificial-intelligence-tool-for-automatic-colorectal-cancer-tissue-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Researchers-develop-artificial-intelligence-tool-for-automatic-colorectal-cancer-tissue-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2794048f-0cda-4646-8f49-1adc2a0d09d6 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 22:46:12 -0400 Researchers develop artificial intelligence tool for automatic colorectal cancer tissue analysis
